Parameter.name: BFC_Received_Packet_ID
Parameter.shortDescription: The telecommand packetID that was received

Parameter.name: BFC_Uptime
Parameter.shortDescription: The system uptime in seconds (uint16 gives around 18 hour max uptime)

Parameter.name: BFC_Uplink_RSSI
Parameter.shortDescription: The RSSI of the last packet received from telecommand issuing base station (assume RSSI is positive valued)

Parameter.name: BFC_Uplink_Status
Parameter.shortDescription: Do we have a connection with a telecommand issuing base station?

Parameter.name: BFC_Barometer_Reference_Pressure
Parameter.shortDescription: Sea level pressure that barometer uses to determine altitude

Parameter.shortDescription: The telecommand packetID that was received

Parameter.name: PFC_Uplink_Status
Parameter.shortDescription: Do we have a connection with a telecommand issuing base station?

Parameter.name: PFC_Barometer_Reference_Pressure
Parameter.shortDescription: Sea level pressure that barometer uses to determine altitude

Parameter.name: PFC_Baro_Air_Temperature
Parameter.shortDescription: The baro temperature near the experiment
